verses.verse: Paul <WG3972> and Timotheus, <WG5095> the servants <WG1401> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> to all <WG3956> the saints <WG40> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> which <WG3588> are at <WG1722> Philippi, <WG5375> with the bishops <WG1985> and deacons: <WG1249>
Grace <WG5485> be to you, and peace, <WG1515> from God <WG2316> our Father, <WG3962> and from the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
I thank <WG2168> my God <WG2316> on every <WG3956> remembrance <WG3417> of you,
Always <WG3842> in every <WG3956> prayer <WG1162> of my <WG3450> for you all <WG3956> making <WG4160> request <WG1162> with joy, <WG5479>
For your <WG5216> fellowship <WG2842> in the gospel <WG2098> from the first <WG4413> day <WG2250> until <WG891> now; <WG3568>

Being confident <WG3982> of this <WG5124> very <WG846> thing, that he which has begun <WG1728> a good <WG18> work <WG2041> in you will perform <WG2005> it until <WG891> the day <WG2250> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

Even <WG2531> as it is meet <WG1342> for me to think <WG5426> this <WG5124> of you all, <WG3956> because <WG1223> I have <WG2192> you in my heart; <WG2588> inasmuch <WG1909> <WG3745> as both <WG5037> in my bonds, <WG1199> and in the defense <WG627> and confirmation <WG951> of the gospel, <WG2098> you all <WG3956> are partakers <WG4791> of my grace. <WG5485>
For God <WG2316> is my record, <WG3144> how <WG5613> greatly <WG1971> I long <WG1971> after <WG1971> you all <WG3956> in the bowels <WG4698> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
And this <WG5124> I pray, <WG4336> that your <WG5216> love <WG26> may abound <WG4052> yet <WG2089> more <WG3123> and more <WG3123> in knowledge <WG1922> and in all <WG3956> judgment; <WG144>
That you may approve <WG1381> things that are excellent; <WG1308> that you may be sincere <WG1506> and without <WG677> offense <WG677> till <WG1519> the day <WG2250> of Christ. <WG5547>
Being filled <WG4137> with the fruits <WG2590> of righteousness, <WG1343> which <WG3588> are by Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> to the glory <WG1391> and praise <WG1868> of God. <WG2316>
But I would you should understand, <WG1097> brothers, <WG80> that the things which happened to me have fallen <WG2064> out rather <WG3123> to the furtherance <WG4297> of the gospel; <WG2098>
So <WG5620> that my bonds <WG1199> in Christ <WG5547> are manifest <WG5318> in all <WG3650> the palace, <WG4232> and in all <WG3956> other <WG3062> places;

And many <WG4119> of the brothers <WG80> in the Lord, <WG2962> waxing <WG3982> confident <WG3982> by my bonds, <WG1199> are much <WG4056> more <WG4056> bold <WG5111> to speak <WG2980> the word <WG3056> without <WG870> fear. <WG870>
Some <WG5100> indeed <WG3303> preach <WG2784> Christ <WG5547> even <WG2532> of envy <WG5355> and strife; <WG2054> and some <WG5100> also <WG2532> of good <WG2107> will: <WG2107>
The one <WG3303> preach <WG2605> Christ <WG5547> of contention, <WG2052> not sincerely, <WG55> supposing <WG3633> to add <WG2018> affliction <WG2347> to my bonds: <WG1199>
But the other of love, <WG26> knowing <WG1492> that I am set <WG2749> for the defense <WG627> of the gospel. <WG2098>

What <WG5101> then? <WG1063> notwithstanding, <WG4133> every <WG3956> way, <WG5158> whether <WG1535> in pretense, <WG4392> or <WG1535> in truth, <WG226> Christ <WG5547> is preached; <WG2605> and I therein <WG1722> <WG5129> do rejoice, <WG5463> yes, <WG235> and will rejoice. <WG5463>

For I know <WG1492> that this <WG5124> shall turn <WG576> to my salvation <WG4991> through <WG1223> your <WG5216> prayer, <WG1162> and the supply <WG2024> of the Spirit <WG4151> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>

According <WG2596> to my earnest <WG603> expectation <WG603> and my hope, <WG1680> that in nothing <WG3762> I shall be ashamed, <WG153> but that with all <WG3956> boldness, <WG3954> as always, <WG3842> so now <WG3568> also <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> shall be magnified <WG3170> in my body, <WG4983> whether <WG1535> it be by life, <WG2222> or <WG1535> by death. <WG2288>
For to me to live <WG2198> is Christ, <WG5547> and to die <WG599> is gain. <WG2771>
But if <WG1487> I live <WG2198> in the flesh, <WG4561> this <WG5124> is the fruit <WG2590> of my labor: <WG2041> yet <WG2532> what <WG5101> I shall choose <WG138> I know <WG1107> not.
For I am in a strait <WG4912> between <WG1537> two, <WG1417> having <WG2192> a desire <WG1939> to depart, <WG360> and to be with Christ; <WG5547> which is far <WG4183> <WG3123> better: <WG2909>
Nevertheless <WG1161> to abide <WG1961> in the flesh <WG4561> is more <WG316> needful <WG316> for you.

And having this <WG5124> confidence, <WG3982> I know <WG1492> that I shall abide <WG3306> and continue <WG4839> with you all <WG3956> for your <WG5216> furtherance <WG4297> and joy <WG5479> of faith; <WG4102>
That your <WG5216> rejoicing <WG2745> may be more abundant <WG4052> in Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> for me by my coming <WG3952> to you again. <WG3825>

Only <WG3440> let your conversation <WG4176> be as it becomes <WG516> the gospel <WG2098> of Christ: <WG5547> that whether <WG1535> I come <WG2064> and see <WG1492> you, or <WG1535> else be absent, <WG548> I may hear <WG191> of your <WG5216> affairs, <WG4012> that you stand <WG4739> fast in one <WG1520> spirit, <WG4151> with one <WG3391> mind <WG5590> striving <WG4866> together <WG4866> for the faith <WG4102> of the gospel; <WG2098>

And in nothing <WG3367> terrified <WG4426> by your <WG3588> adversaries: <WG480> which <WG3748> is to them an evident <WG1732> token <WG1732> of perdition, <WG684> but to you of salvation, <WG4991> and that of God. <WG2316>
For to you it is given <WG5483> in the behalf <WG5228> of Christ, <WG5547> not only <WG3440> to believe <WG4100> on <WG1519> him, but also <WG2532> to suffer <WG3958> for his sake;
Having <WG2192> the same <WG846> conflict <WG73> which <WG3634> you saw <WG1492> in me, and now <WG3568> hear <WG191> to be in me.
